Changes.LogName: NPC Manifestation - gives Oliver a birthday

Entries.OliverK: Thanks. This is really cool!/557 581 587 589/Thanks, I like this./584 585 586 583 579/I don't get why you'd give me this./344 340 -80 -28/This is disgusting./346/Hey, thanks./395/
Entries.JosephineK: You're really giving me this? How generous!/344 340 348/Thank you, I really appreciate this./350 -26 461/This is... not really my thing. Sorry./-15 -74/Sorry...I feel a little insulted by this./-28/Thank you.//

Entries.OliverK: $1 Oliver_Meet#Hi. You're the farmer, right? I'm Oliver. Dad dragged me here to check out this lame-as festival... I'm bored already.$2#$e#I like it here, it's quiet... but I 'spose I'd better head up soon, try the soup. Do you think it'll be any good?$2
Entries.JosephineK: $1 Josephine_Meet#Oh, hello! I'm Josephine, the Governor's wife. It's a pleasure to meet you... You haven't seen our son, Oliver around have you?#$e#Hello @! I wish Oliver would be a little more social... He needs some friends that aren't behind a screen.$2

Entries.OliverK: You know... I'm getting to kinda like this festival. Willy's been telling me some of his fishing yarns.$1
Entries.JosephineK: You haven't seen Olly around have you? If you do, let him know that he'd better spend some time with his parents!$1

Entries.57873001/e 57873000/t 600 1200: continue/12 14/farmer -100 -100 3 OliverK 15 13 3 JosephineK 13 13 1 Lewis -100 -100 3/addTemporaryActor JosephineLuggage 32 32 16 22 2 false/skippable/pause 500/textAboveHead JosephineK "Where is he?"/pause 500/move OliverK 3 0 2/textAboveHead OliverK "He's late."/speak OliverK "Maybe he's not coming. Probably forgot about us.$2"/warp farmer 0 23/move farmer 12 0 0 true/pause 500/speak JosephineK "Oh, I'm sure that's not the case, Olly. He's probably been delayed.#$b#Mayor Lewis is a very busy man."/pause 500/faceDirection OliverK 1/speak OliverK "I still don't see why we had to come here. I've told you, I'm fine!$2"/speak JosephineK "We are not going to argue about this again, Oliver..."/faceDirection JosephineK 2/jump JosephineK 4/move OliverK -4 0 2/speak JosephineK "Oh, hello... @, isn't it? You're the local farmer?"/emote farmer 56/move JosephineK 0 4 2 true/move farmer 0 -4 0 true/pause 2000/speak JosephineK "Mayor Lewis was supposed to meet us here...$2"/quickQuestion #Something must have held him up.#He's probably forgotten.#He's busy, so he asked me to meet you.(break)speak JosephineK "That's what I've suspected. We shall have to find our own way."(break)textAboveHead OliverK "Told you so!"\speak JosephineK "Oh, I'm sure that's not the case. My husband contacted him to confirm our times just this morning.$2"(break)friendship JosephineK 50\speak JosephineK "He did? Oh, thank you.$1"/pause 500/move OliverK -1 0 2/speak JosephineK "I do hate to ask, for I'm sure you must be very busy, but could you possibly give us a hand with our luggage?"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/warp Lewis 34 23/speed Lewis 5/move Lewis -20 0 0/faceDirection JosephineK 2/faceDirection OliverK 2/textAboveHead Lewis "*Puff Puff**"/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Lewis "Sorry I'm late..."/move Lewis 0 -6 3/faceDirection JosephineK 1/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lewis "Please accept my apologies. I was unavoidably detained.$2"/textAboveHead JosephineK "Apology accepted."/pause 1000/faceDirection JosephineK 2/speak JosephineK "Thank you for your time, @. I hope we will see more of one another."/emote farmer 32/faceDirection JosephineK 1/textAboveHead JosephineK "Now, about our luggage..."/move JosephineK 0 6 1 true/move Lewis 0 6 3 true/move OliverK 0 6 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 2500/textAboveHead OliverK "Unavoidably detained?"/pause 3000/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
Entries.57873005/f Josephine 2500/e ???/t 600 18: continue/12 14/farmer OliverK JosephineK Jacob/addConversationTopic Josephine_Leaves 0/ Josephine says goodbye, Oliver says he'll be back soon.

Entries.57873005/e 57873004/f JosephineK 2500: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 JosephineK 64 18 0/addMailReceived Josephine_Leaves/speak JosephineK "Hello @. It has been a pleasure getting to know you... but I'm afraid it's now time for me to return to the city."/pause 1000/end

Entries.CryptoToday_Oliver: @! We need to talk. It's about Lexi. I screwed up. I'm sorry! Meet me at the Inn.    - Oliver %item conversationTopic TalkOllyLexi 7 %%[#]Urgent Letter from Oliver
Entries.CrytoToday_Oliver: @! We need to talk. It's about Lexi. I screwed up. I'm sorry! Meet me at the Inn.    - Oliver %item conversationTopic TalkOllyLexi 7 %%[#]Urgent Letter from Oliver

Entries.57873002/e 57873000/p JosephineK/f Josep: continue/10 19/farmer 12 20 0 Pierre 5 17 2 JosephineK 5 22 3/skippable/pause 1000/move JosephineK 0 -3 0/speak JosephineK "This fresh fruit looks delicious. Tell me, is it locally grown?"/pause 500/speak Pierre "Oh yes, all of our fresh produce is locally sourced. Grown in my own back -"/emote Pierre 16/speak Pierre "Wait... there's something familiar about you... I've been trying to figure it out.$3"/pause 500/speak JosephineK "Yes, we met at the Luau. I attended with my husband.$1"/speak Pierre "No... no, it's not that..."/emote farmer 8/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Pierre "Wait, I know! The Zuzu songbird!"/pause 500/jump JosephineK 5/pause 1000/move JosephineK 1 0 3/emote JosephineK 60/speak JosephineK "No... you are mistaken, sir. I'm afraid you've confused me with someone else.#$b#Someone who died a long time ago...$2"/speed JosephineK 5/move JosephineK 0 10 2 true/textAboveHead Pierre "Wait!"/pause 2500/warp JosephineK -100 -100/speak Pierre "I have all your records...$2"/pause 500/move farmer -4 0 0/emote farmer 8/speak Pierre "Hello @. How can I help you today?"/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end

Entries.57873003/f OliverK 500/p OliverK/t 1800: continue/15 13/OliverK 13 11 1 farmer 18 18 3/skippable/animate OliverK false true 140 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24 24/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/move farmer -3 0 0 true/pause 500/playSound ghost/textAboveHead OliverK "Got you!"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/move farmer 0 -1 0/doAction 15 16/playSound doorOpen/move farmer 0 -5 3/playSound ghost/speak OliverK "Take that sucker!"/pause 500/playSound openChest/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/playMusic VolcanoMines1/stopAnimation OliverK 24/textAboveHead OliverK "Oh no..."/pause 500/move OliverK 0 1 1/jump OliverK 2/speak OliverK "@! Where did you come from? Does nobody ever knock around here?"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 1500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak OliverK "Oh, it's nothing, just a dumb game."/question fork1 "...#Hey, nothing dumb about that. Video games are great!#Shouldn't you be studying or something?"/fork Oliver_NoHelp/pause 500/emote OliverK 32/speak OliverK "Maybe you can help me then? I've been battling through this pyramid forever. Killed a ton of mummies!$!#$b#But now I've got to answer three stupid riddles - and if I get them wrong... I die.$2"/textAboveHead OliverK "*sigh*"/speak OliverK "And I'm absolutely rotten at riddles.$2"/question fork0 "...#No thanks. I'm terrible at them too.#Sure, why not?"/fork Oliver_NoHelp/pause 500/friendship OliverK 50/jump OliverK 3/speak OliverK "Great! Come on then!"/move OliverK 0 -1 1/showFrame OliverK 24/warp OliverK 13 10/move farmer -1 0 1/warp farmer 13 11/positionOffset farmer 0 16/showFrame 117/pause 1500/fade/viewport -100 -100/message "The room reeks of decay, and something older, darker. The leonine creature regards you with pale blue eyes. Her face is beautiful, inhuman and terrifying.^^'Greetings mortal,' she purrs. 'It has been too long since I toyed with one of your kin. Perhaps you shall last a little longer than my last... plaything.'^^She rolls something forward with a paw almost as large as your head: a skull gazes up at you from hollow eyes.^^'Three riddles you must answer, mortal. Three riddles you must solve. And if you fail... well, I am feeling rather peckish...'"/message "Answer me this riddle, hapless mortal"/pause 400/message "I follow you through the day. I mimic your every move, but I cannot be touched, nor can I be caged."/speak OliverK "$q 5787331 null# What am I?#$r 5787332 0 Oliver_Right1#My shadow#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#My reflection#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#Fate"/fork 5787332 OliverRid1/switchEvent SphinxDie
Entries.Oliver_NoHelp: pause 500/speak OliverK "Okay, well, no worries then. Thanks for dropping by. I guess.$2"/move OliverK 0 -1 1/showFrame OliverK 24/animate OliverK false true 140 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24 24/pause 1500/emote farmer 40/pause 1500/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 4 2/playSound death/textAboveHead OliverK "Darn it."/pause 500/end
Entries.OliverRid1: pause 500/message "'You are ... correct.'^^She seems startled at this, but not displeased.^^'It has been many moons since one answered me true. Ah, but the next shall surely seal your fate.'"/pause 500/message "I am so fragile that merely speaking my name shall break me."/speak OliverK "$q 5787334 null#What am I?#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A promise#$r 5787335 0 Oliver_Right2#Silence#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A Vow"/fork 5787335 OliverRid2/switchEvent SphinxDie
Entries.OliverRid2: pause 500/message "'What?! You are not as stupid as you look, human. But still! There is yet one more, and when you answer false, I shall devor you!'"/pause 500/message "I am always hungry and will die if not fed, but whatever I touch shall soon turn red."/pause 500/speak OliverK "$q 5787336 null#What am I?#$r 5787337 0 Oliver_Right3#Fire.#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A dragon#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A story"/fork OliverRid3/switchEvent SphinxDie
Entries.OliverRid3: pause 500/message "'How? How could you have answered all of my riddles correctly? This... this is unprecedented.'"/pause 500/friendship OliverK 50/message "The sphinx seems shaken, and displeased. Her muscles tense, and she draws her lips back to reveal razor sharp teeth.^^'You have answered me true, little human, and thus I must permit you to pass. Run, before I change my mind!"/warp OliverK 14 12 true/warp farmer 15 12 true/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 15 13/pause 1500/textAboveHead OliverK "We did it!"/speak OliverK "Well, you did itI suppose.$1#$b#Thanks @. You're pretty awesome. Let me know if you want to join our clan!"/emote farmer 32/speak OliverK "There's three of us that play. Saturday night's mostly. Mom gets grumpy if I play on weeknights.$2"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.SphinxDie: pause 500/message "'Your answer is incorrect, ignorant human. Prepare to die!'^^The creature lunges forward, jaws agape. There's nowhere to run..."/stopMusic/playSound death/message "G A M E   O V E R"/pause 500/warp OliverK 14 12 true/warp farmer 15 12 true/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 15 13/pause 500/speak OliverK "Well, thanks for trying, @. Maybe next time.$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
Entries.57873012/f OliverK 1500/f JosephineK 100: continue/15 13/OliverK 15 11 1 JosephineK 16 11 3 farmer 18 18 3/addConversationTopic OliverJosephineSongbird 3/skippable/emote OliverK 12/move farmer -3 0 0 true/speak OliverK "If you don't want to do it, Mom, just tell them 'no!'. Don't use me as your 'Get Out of Life' card.$a"/pause 500/emote JosephineK 28/emote farmer 8/faceDirection OliverK 2/textAboveHead JosephineK "But Oliver..."/move OliverK 0 5 2/playSound doorOpen/doAction 15 16/playSound doorOpen/move farmer 1 0 3/move OliverK 0 2 1/faceDirection JosephineK 2/emote JosephineK 40/jump OliverK/speak OliverK "Oh, farmer @! Sneaking around again, I see!$1"/move JosephineK 0 -2 0/shake JosephineK 450/emote farmer 12/speak OliverK "Heh, I'm kidding. But Mom's being totally unreasonable... I think.$2"/emote farmer 40/speak OliverK "Yeah, I'll tell you about it, come with me."/fade/viewport -100 -100/playMusic desolate/warp OliverK 26 12/warp farmer 27 12/viewport 25 13/advancedMove JosephineK false -1 0 0 9 -7 0 0 -7 -4 0 0 -1/faceDirection OliverK 3/pause 500/faceDirection OliverK 2/faceDirection farmer 2/speak OliverK "So, you know I was sick as a kid, right?"/emote farmer 56/speak OliverK "Well, it was pretty bad. We were in and out of hospital for years. I almost died, I guess.$2"/emote farmer 28/speak OliverK "But I'm fine now! I've been in remission for seven years, which is, you know, basically cured."/emote OliverK 40/pause 1000/speak OliverK "But Mom still treats me like I'm that sickly kid.$2#$b#And now she's turning down an awesome opportunity and blaming it on me.$a"/emote farmer 16/speak OliverK "She used to be this big name opera singer. The Zuzu Songbird. You might've heard of her?"/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 32/faceDirection OliverK 2/speak OliverK "She gave it all up when I got sick, but she still practices - sings every morning and stuff."/faceDirection farmer 2/speak OliverK "Now her old producer's pushing her for a reunion concert.#$b#And she's saying 'no'. Which is cool, whatever, it's her life.#$b#Except that she's telling him it's because of me.$a"/faceDirection OliverK 3/pause 1000/emote OliverK 12/faceDirection OliverK 2/speak OliverK "If she really wants to do it, then she should do it!$a#$b#And if she doesn't, then just tell them already!$a#$b#I'm sick of being her excuse.$s"/emote farmer 40/quickQuestion #Does she know you feel this way?#She's your mother... she loves you! Show her some respect.#Sounds manipulative. Don't let her use you like that.(break)speak OliverK "Yes! I've told her enough times. She just doesn't listen...$2"(break)speak OliverK "Don't you think I know that? And I'm not sure you quite get my point.$2"(break)speak OliverK "Hey, that's a bit harsh! I love my mom.$a"/speak OliverK "But you're not entirely wrong.#$b#I guess I've got to talk to her, is all. Properly, like we're both grown-ups."/move farmer 0 -1 2/move OliverK 3 0 3/speak OliverK "Then maybe she'll see that I'm not just a sick little boy anymore.#$b#Thanks @. Talking to you has really helped, you're like that TV Doctor Guru guy."/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
Entries.57873013/e 57873012/f JosephineK 1500/p: continue/40 19/Rosa 45 27 2 farmer 40 28 0 JosephineK 40 10 2/skippable/doAction 40 16/pause 1000/move JosephineK 0 8 2 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/pause 2000/emote JosephineK 32/pause 1000/speak JosephineK "Oh, hello @! I've been wanting to talk to you."/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak JosephineK "I believe Oliver confided in you?"/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/move JosephineK 1 0 2/move farmer 0 -1 1/speak JosephineK "Oh! I'm glad he had someone to talk to. Teenagers... well, they do have their challenges!"/emote JosephineK 40/pause 1000/speak JosephineK "He spoke to me afterwards. It scares me sometimes how independent he's becoming.#$b#I guess it's hard for me to see past the child he was.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection JosephineK 1/pause 1000/faceDirection JosephineK 2/speak JosephineK "He made me realise that I have been ... unreasonable, @.#$b#That I had become too much of the mother of a sick child to fail to see how he's grown up...#$b#...and lost a part of myself in the process.$2"/pause 500/speak JosephineK "I miss her, you know, the Zuzu Songbird. There's nothing quite like performing in front of an audience, becoming someone else for a while.#$b#But... I just don't know.$2"/quickQuestion #It's an amazing opportunity, you should definitely do it!#It's your decision, the choice must be your own.#As long as your voice is up for it!#What does your husband think?(break)jump JosephineK 3\friendship JosephineK 50\speak JosephineK "It is, isn't it! Thank you for your support.$1"(break)friendship JosephineK 25\speak JosephineK "You're right, of course."(break)friendship JosephineK -25\speak JosephineK "It most certainly is!$a#$b#Or... at least I hope it is.$2"(break)speak JosephineK "Oh! I'd better ask him!"/pause 500/speak JosephineK "I've still much to think about, before I make a decision. But I am grateful for your advice."/emote JosephineK 20/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.57873015/e 57872012/t 1600 2100: continue/15 13/OliverK 13 11 1 farmer 18 18 3/skippable/addConversationTopic KennedyLexi 14/showFrame OliverK 24/move farmer -3 0 0 true/pause 500/speak OliverK "Yes, I'm totally positive it wasn't a person in costume..."/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak OliverK "It was... They are... an absolutely bona fide cyptid. If a photograph isn't enough for you to believe me? Well, I don't know what else to do.$a"/emote OliverK 12/speak OliverK "Okay. Fine. I'll talk to you later."/pause 1000/move OliverK 0 1 2/move farmer 0 -1 0/doAction 15 16/playSound doorOpen/move farmer 0 -5 3/faceDirection OliverK 1/speak OliverK "Oh... um... hi @. What are you doing here?"/emote farmer 40/quickQuestion #I heard everything! You're selling Lexi out!#Who were you talking to about Lexi?(break)emote OliverK 28\speak OliverK "I'm not! I wasn't! I...$2"(break)emote OliverK 60\speak OliverK "A...A friend.$2"/faceDirection OliverK 3/speak OliverK "Okay fine... I showed my friend Kennedy a photo of me and Lexi... but she doesn't believe they're real.#$b#Like I'd go to a ton of work to get someone to dress in a mega-realistic costume just to prank my friends.$a#$b#T hat's all. Okay.$2"/faceDirection OliverK 1/speak OliverK "And you shouldn't be listening at doors anyway.$a"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.57873018/n CryptoToday_Oliver/p OliverK: desolate/29 13/OliverK 30 11 2 farmer 35 18 0 Rosa 45 27 2/skippable/addConversationTopic CryptoToday_Talk 7/move OliverK 5 0 2 true/move farmer 0 -5 0 true/pause 3000/jump OliverK/speak OliverK "@! You're here. We... we need to talk.$2"/emote farmer 8/move OliverK 0 -5 3/pause 1000/faceDirection OliverK 2/speak OliverK "Good, coast's clear. Anyone in the lobby?$3"/emote farmer 36/pause 1000/move OliverK 0 4 2/pause 750/textAboveHead OliverK "Good."/move OliverK 0 1 3 true/move farmer 0 -1 3 true/pause 1000/move OliverK -5 0 2 true/move farmer -5 0 3 true/pause 2000/move farmer -1 0 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/emote OliverK 28/pause 1000/speak OliverK "I've been an idiot. And I need your help.$2"/jump farmer 3/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak OliverK "Kennedy's aunt saw the photo of Lexi and me...$3"/pause 1000/faceDirection OliverK 1/pause 1000/faceDirection OliverK 2/speak OliverK "Kennedy didn't believe me. She... she said it was all a joke! But her aunt's into all this paranormal sh- err stuff. She writes for a newspaper. Cryptozoology Today...$2"/faceDirection OliverK 3/faceDirection OliverK 2/pause 1000/speak OliverK "She saw the photo! Kennedy was using it as her screensaver or something... anyhow...$4"/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 1/speak OliverK "She's coming to talk to me. To... to get an...$2"/textAboveHead OliverK "...an exclusive."/pause 500/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/speak OliverK "I don't know what to do, @! Lexi didn't say I had to keep them secret... but... I know people have hurt them in the past and...$5"/faceDirection OliverK 2/faceDirection farmer 0/textAboveHead OliverK "I'm worried."/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/speak OliverK "$q 5787340 null#What do I do?#$r 5787341 -100 OliverLexi_A#You've been a fool! If anything happens to Lexi, it's all your fault.#$r 5787342 0 OliverLexi_B#You're just going to have to tell her you made it all up.#$r 5787342 0 OliverLexi_C#Maybe we should ask Lexi what they want us to do."/fork 5787341 OliverBad/pause 1000/emote farmer 60/speak OliverK "I feel terrible, @. I just wanted Kennedy to think I was cool.$3#$b#And now she'll think I'm a joke.$5"/pause 1000/faceDirection OliverK 2/speak OliverK "I just hope Lexi'll still be my friend. Do you think they will?$3"/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak OliverK "Yeh... I guess there's only one way to find out.$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
Entries.OliverBad: pause 1000/textAboveHead OliverK "I'm leaving"/faceDirection OliverK 1/pause 1000/move OliverK 6 0 2 true/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/fade/end
Entries.57873021/e 57872011/f OliverK 2000/f Jac: continue/44 27/OliverK 33 27 0 JosephineK 42 19 1 farmer 46 29 0 Rosa 45 27 2 Jacob -100 -100 0/skippable/addMailReceived JacobOliverWork/addConversationTopic Oliver_Jacob_Help 5/add Mailpause 1000/playSound doorOpen/warp Jacob 44 31/move Jacob 0 -2 0 true/move OliverK 2 0 2 true/move JosephineK -2 0 2 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/textAboveHead Rosa "Hello Dr.Jacob!"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Jacob "Hello Rosa"/faceDirection Jacob 1/speak Jacob "And @."/move OliverK 0 2 1 true/move JosephineK 0 2 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Jacob 0/speak Jacob "I was hoping to ask a favor, Rosa."/jump Rosa 3/emote Rosa 8/pause 1000/speak Rosa "What can I do you for, Dr. Jacob."/pause 1000/move OliverK 7 0 1 true/move JosephineK 0 7 2 true/speak Jacob "I'm booked to examine the poultry over at Mistview Meadows tomorrow, and could really use another pair of hands.$2#$b#I understand you've had some experience with animals?"/emote Rosa 28/speak Rosa "I'm terribly sorry Dr. Jacob...I've got prior commitments... I can't.$2"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Jacob "Oh..."/faceDirection Jacob 1/pause 1000/emote Jacob 8/pause 1000/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead OliverK "I'll help."/jump JosephineK 4/emote farmer 16/move JosephineK 0 2 1 true/faceDirection Jacob 3/pause 1000/speak OliverK "I could do it! I helped with the gull, didn't I?$1"/move JosephineK 2 0 1/speak JosephineK "But Oliver... Are you sure..."/faceDirection OliverK 2/faceDirection JosephineK 0/speak JosephineK "It could be dangerous..."/textAboveHead OliverK "Mom!"/speak Jacob "They're rescued battery chickens, Ma'am. The worst damage they can deliver is a peck."/speak JosephineK "But diseases... poor Oliver has a weakened immune...$2"/speak OliverK "Mom! I'm not a little kid anymore. And my immune system is fine!$a#$b#Besides, I'm sure Dr. Jacob has gloves!"/speak Jacob "Gloves, gowns, the full wardrobe."/faceDirection JosephineK 1/faceDirection OliverK 1/speak Jacob "Oliver helped me in the surgery the other day.#$b#He's a fine young man, with a steady hand,strong heart. And a sturdy constitution.$1"/emote OliverK 60/speak Jacob "He'd be an asset as an assistant. So... what do you say?"/pause 1000/emote JosephineK 40/faceDirection JosephineK 0/faceDirection OliverK 2/pause 1000/speak JosephineK "What about your schoolwork? Don't think you can cast that aside to go gallivanting around the countryside.$3"/speak OliverK "I'll do it tomorrow night. I'm ahead on the curriculum anyway.#$b#Come on, Mom, you always say it's good to get off the computer.$3"/pause 1000/speak JosephineK "I think you're old enough to make your own decision, Oliver."/textAboveHead OliverK "Thanks Mom!"/faceDirection OliverK 1/speak OliverK "So, what time do I start?"/emote JosephineK 20/emote Jacob 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.57873014/e 57873001/w sunny/d Tue Thu Sa: continue/26 26/Lewis 24 23 2 JosephineK 25 23 2 farmer 15 31 3/skippable/move farmer 8 0 0 true/pause 1000/speak Lewis "This fountain was hand-crafted with local stone, mined from our very own quarry."/speak JosephineK "Oh! Well it's very... err, practical. The simplicity of its design really harmonizes with the quaint nature of your little town.$1"/emote Lewis 12/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Ah, good day, @! I was just showing the First Lady some of the sights."/move farmer 0 -7 1 true/speak JosephineK "Oh, no need to use my formal title, Mayor Lewis!$1#$b#I'm here to enjoy your charming rural hospitality - not in an official capacity."/faceDirection Lewis 1/faceDirection Josephine 3/speak Lewis "That is as it may be, but I rather feel that making a good impression is part of that hospitality."/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Don't you agree, @?"/emote farmer 32/speak Lewis "@ here has done a lot for this town.#$b#His fresh produce has really helped to bolster our economy.^Her fresh produce has really helped bolster our economy."/emote JosephineK 20/speak JosephineK "Oh, excellent! Do you also dabble in preserves? I do love organically-made preserves.$1"/emote farmer 56/speak JosephineK "How absolutely charming! I look forward to sampling some.$1"/pause 1000/faceDirection JosephineK 3/faceDirection Lewis 1/speak JosephineK "Now, I believe the Mayor was about to show me the Community Center?"/emote Lewis 28/speak JosephineK "Guvvie talks about it all the time! He has fond memories of visiting this valley as a child, you know.$2"/speak Lewis "Um... yes. Yes I was.$2#$b#It's err... just along here, to our left. If you would care to lead on? Ladies first, and all that."/move Lewis 0 1 1/move JosephineK 0 1 3/emote JosephineK 32/speak JosephineK "Oh, this is very exciting! I am rather fond of these rustic aesthetics!$1"/pause 500/move JosephineK 8 0 0 true/move Lewis 8 0 0 true/move farmer 8 0 0 true/viewport move 2 0 1500/pause 3000/fade/viewport -100 -100/switchEvent CommunityCenterJosephine

Entries.CommunityCenterJosephine: pause 1500/warp JosephineK 54 24/warp Lewis 53 24/warp farmer 52 24/viewport 52 23/speak JosephineK "Oh, it's...#$b#...Rather more rustic than I had imagined.$2"/speak Lewis "It's a mess. We know.$2"/faceDirection JosephineK 3/faceDirection Lewis 1/speak JosephineK "Why have you not asked Guvvy for financial aid towards its restoration?$5#$b#He would've loaned you the funds, you know. He loves these old buildings."/faceDirection JosephineK 0/emote Lewis 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Lewis "Um..."/faceDirection Lewis 3/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 1/speak Lewis "'Loaned' being the key word, your Ladyship...#$b#I could not in good conscience accept a loan we might not be capable of repaying.$2"/pause 1000/textAboveHead JosephineK "Ah, pride."/speak JosephineK "I understand the determination to face things alone, and stand on your own two feet."/faceDirection JosephineK 0/speak JosephineK "But still, it is sad to see such a beautiful building in such a state of disrepair.$2"/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 0/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Lewis "Ah, that it is indeed. Now, err... how about we visit a different building?#$b#And you can sample some of the local cuisine. Our Gus is a very fine chef."/faceDirection Lewis 2/faceDirection JosephineK 2/speak JosephineK "That sounds like a delightful idea. Would you care to join us, @?"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

pause 1500/warp JosephineK 54 24/warp Lewis 53 24/warp farmer 52 24/viewport 52 22/speak JosephineK "How delightful! I was just showing Governess Josephine my latest sculpture."/speak JosephineK "The correct title is First Lady, Miss Leah.$1"/emote Leah 60/speak JosephineK "But there's no need for titles between friends, is there."/move farmer -2 0 3/faceDirection JosephineK 2/speak JosephineK "I think it's absolutely marvellous, and would add a delightful touch of rustic charm to my conservatory.$1#$b#Don't you agree, @?"/emote Leah 12/pause 500/speak Leah "I'm afraid it's not for sale.$a"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/jump JosephineK 2/speak JosephineK "Oh, goodness! I would be grateful if you'd consider me.$2"/emote Leah 32/pause 1000/end

Changes: Answer me this riddle, hapless mortal"/pause 400/message "I follow you through the day and mimic your every move, but you can neither touch me, nor catch me."/speak OliverK "$q 5787331 null# What am I?#$r 5787332 0 Oliver_Right1#My shadow#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#My reflection"/fork 5787332 OliverRid1/switchEvent SphinxDie

Entries.OliverRid1: pause 500/message "You are correct. But this next one shall truly stump you."/pause 500/message "What is so fragile that saying its name breaks it."/speak OliverK "$q 5787334 null#...#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A promise#$r 5787335 0 Oliver_Right2#Silence"/fork 5787335 OliverRid2/switchEvent SphinxDie
Entries.OliverRid2: pause 500/message "What! You are not as stupid as you look, human. But still! There is yet one more, and when you answer false, I shall devor you!"/pause 500/message "I am always hungry and will die if not fed, but whatever I touch shall soon turn red."/pause 500/speak OliverK "$r 5787336 null#What am I?#$r 5787337 0 Oliver_Right3#Fire.#$r 5787333 0 Oliver_Wrong#A dragon"/fork OliverRid3/switchEvent SphinxDie
Entries.OliverRid3: pause 500/message "How? How could you have answered all of my riddles correctly? This... this is unprecedented."/pause 500/friendship OliverK 50/message "The sphinx steps aside, permitting passage through her domain."/pause 500/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation EastScarpeInn/viewport -100 -100/warp OliverK 14 12 true/warp farmer 15 12 true/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 3/textAboveHead OliverK "We did it!"/speak OliverK "Well, you did itI suppose.$1#$b#Thanks @. You're pretty awesome. Let me know if you want to join our clan!"/emote farmer 32/speak OliverK "There's three of us that play. Saturday night's mostly. Mom gets grumpy if I play on weeknights.$2"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.SphinxDie: pause 500/message "Your answer is incorrect, ignorant human. Prepare to die!"/ambientLight 1 255 1/playSound death/fade/viewport -100 -100/changeLocation EastScarpeInn/viewport -100 -100/warp OliverK 14 12 true/warp farmer 15 12 true/faceDirection OliverK 1/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 15 13/pause 500/speak OliverK "Well, thanks for trying, @. Maybe next time.$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end
